title: The Next Mrs Russo
description: I was not looking for a date. Another questionable relationship was the last thing I needed. Because trust me, they were all questionable. But through a series of unfortunate events involving my cat andhis poor decision-making skills, I agreed to a set-up. Except… the set-up is with the governor. I am not political girlfriend material.For one, I’m a little bit crazy.For two, I have secrets. But I also have a big crush on the governor. One little date can’t hurt, right?Spoiler: it can. My big crush is going to end in big trouble.
author: Jana Aston
